news.title: Fed is likely to lower rates only two more times, even under Trump's next chair pick: CNBC Fed survey
news.summary: Forecasters don't believe the next Fed chair installed by President Donald Trump will drive down overnight rates towards the low levels demanded by the president.

news.title: Pinterest laying off 15% of workforce in push toward AI roles and teams
news.summary: The company said it's "reallocating resources" to roles and teams focused on artificial intelligence. The company also said it was creating new roles for data scientists and data analysts.

news.title: All eyes are on Trump's reaction to the 'mother of all deals' between India and the EU
news.summary: The trade deal is being widely seen as a strategic hedge against volatile U.S. trade policies. The deal is expected to be in place by the end of the year.

news.title: Health insurers tumble after Trump administration proposes keeping Medicare Advantage rates flat next year
news.summary: Humana, CVS Health and UnitedHealth Group plunge in extended trading. Shares of large Medicare plan providers Humana, U.S. Health and CVS plunge.

news.title: Blockbuster social media trial kicks off, with more to come this year
news.summary: A landmark case against social media giants Meta, Alphabet's YouTube and TikTok is set to begin Tuesday in Los Angeles Superior Court. The case is expected to last several days.

news.title: Wall Street veteran who called the dot-com bust says the Magnificent Seven represent an even bigger bubble
news.summary: Investors are ignoring a whole bunch of high-earning companies for the sake of a few tech giants. Richard Bernstein says investors are ignoring these companies because they are too big.

news.title: Boeing beats revenue expectations by a wide margin, as airplane deliveries nearly triple
news.summary: Boeing reported a surprisingly large fourth-quarter profit and beat revenue expectations by a wide margin. Boeing reported a Surprisingly Large fourth- quarter profit and beating revenue expectations.

news.title: Here’s how Microsoft can prove the doubters wrong this earnings season
news.summary: Microsoft can’t currently meet all is AI demand due to a shortage of graphics processing units. Increasing its cloud capacity is key for Microsoft.

news.title: This chart tracks the ‘single greatest predictor’ of stock-market returns — and it’s never done this before
news.summary: Individual stock ownership is a contrarian indicator. It’s flashing a warning. It could be a sign of things to come in the stock market.

news.title: American Airlines provides upbeat revenue outlook despite $200 million hit from winter storm
news.summary: American Airlines' quarterly revenue missed expectations only because of the government shutdown. American Airlines’ stock rallied, as quarterly revenue missing expectations only due to the shutdown.
